title: BugSplat RC resources DLL not found
body:
just reinstalled
after reinstall the logo appears then loads to 3/4 and closes
then nothing but its runing service in the background
then 
BugSplat RC resources DLL not found

it used to work before i need some help please
windows 10x64 last update
dx12

replies.body:
This sounds like a permissions issue that's blocking necessary files from being accessed, and resulting in that error.  Security settings can also cause the patcher to not launch at all.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help resolve this.

You may need to perform a force repatch or reinstall through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) first, though, to make sure your files were installed properly against the overzealous settings.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=12aiRhO5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-22T21:44:23.098+0000)
>
> This sounds like a permissions issue that's blocking necessary files from being accessed, and resulting in that error.  Security settings can also cause the patcher to not launch at all.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help resolve this.
> 
> You may need to perform a force repatch or reinstall through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) first, though, to make sure your files were installed properly against the overzealous settings.

i fixed it
malwarebytes and windows defender /firewall block the launcher 
@Porocles please tell everyone to disable those

windows
windowskey+r and type gpedit.msc
Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > Windows Components > Windows Defender
double click on "Turn off Windows Defender."

start,control panel/activate large icons
windows firewall
turn it off

and exit malwarebytes/spybot search nd destroy (i have both closed both to avoid trouble)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

runing launcher_admin as administrator
UAC disabled
i have NO antivirus beside malwarebytes
imma try the repair tool
